russellrao.answer: My blood sugars are all over the place.  In the mornings, my fasting blood sugars are below, way below 80.  I'm talking like around 55 or 60.  During the day, they can range anywhere in the neighborhood of 150 to 195. Dinner time, maybe 175-200.  At bedtime, they can be over 250.  I do take Lantus at night (20 units).  I take Novolog during the day, 5 units with breakfast and dinner, with a sliding scale as well.  I also take oral medications as well (Metformin 1000 mg, 2 x daily; Glyburide, 10 mg, 2 x daily).  I want to find out what to do.  I talked to my doctor about 3 weeks ago, and at that time, I was taking 25 units of Lantus at night, along with my other meds.  At that time, he said everything looked good.  I don't know what to do.
